column1: Creating biased random numbers from a cryptographically secure source
column2: Some mathematical operations on random numbers can cause bias in the results and compromise security.
column4: Using modulo on a [["cryptographically secure random number"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-327/examples/bad-random.js:5:17:5:37"]] produces biased results.
